name: 5. Temp Progress Notes
content:
=========================


Fully Covered:


  • Demand quantity (total), demand source
  • Tube specs (volume/weight)
  • Truck data (capacity, cost)
  • Supplier metadata (ID, cost, location)


Partially Covered / Needs Minor Work:


  • Material vs conversion cost separation
  • Distance calculation from lat/longs


Yet to be Covered:


  • Period-wise demand bounds
  • Supplier capacity per period
  • Defect rate per supplier ( not specifically mentioned in the HLP ( low priority)
  • Min order quantity per supplier
  • Budget threshold
